CLUE: It's linked to the Mediterranean by the Suez Canal
FOUND IN: Red Sea (the body of water that connects with the Mediterraneamoan via the Suez Canal)
Sports arena (synonymous with stadium but also fits in crosswords)
Tenniel (John Tenniel was a famous illustrator who created many of the original images for Lewis Carroll's 'Alice in Wonderland')
Quarter (as in a quarter of something)
Kiwi (iconic native bird, also the name for a person from New Zealand)
